features: 【Safe Volume & Colorful Lights】:Looks cool, sounds great! To protect kids' hearing, the headphones are limited to an output of 94dB. In addition to the 40mm drivers that deliver full, immersive sound to the iClever kids Bluetooth headphones, they also feature a set of LED lights that run around the edges of the earpiece for an awesome, stylish look!

【25H Playtime】:Whether you' re on a family road trip, the kids are walking to school or they are doing homework, the iClever kids bluetooth headphones will give you 25 hours of uninterrupted listening time on a single charge. Use the 3.5mm backup jack when you want to charge the headphones and listen at the same time.

【All-Day Comfort】:Comfort is paramount to the experience of the iClever kids headphones which are enriched by Memory foam ear cushions, soft and breathable material that makes listening that much better. To fine-tune your fit, you can adjust the headband to your preference so you can listen for hours without strain.

【Bluetooth 5.0 & Hands-Free Call】: No more helping your child untangle cords on wired headphones, these useful and time-saving iClever kids wireless headphones use Bluetooth 5.0 technology to stream music with no wires and no interruptions. You can even play, pause, answer and end calls with the touch of a button. Plus, use the built-in microphone to talk hands-free to friends and fam!

【Foldable & Durable】: Make the walk home that much more enjoyable when you listen to the iClever kids headphones for school, which are conveniently foldable to fit in a backpack along with school supplies. You can even twist, bend and turn the soft headband without worrying about it breaking!
body.description: iClever BTH03 Kids Bluetooth Headphones with Breathable Lights Your kids will glow with the music! Protect your kids' hearing while giving them the best musical experience they can find! These iClever volume limiting kids headphones are unique not only because they have built-in protection for overly loud music, but they feature the added a set of LED lights on the earpieces for an extra fun touch. These special headphones even come equipped with a mic so kids can answer calls from grandma or their friends, hands-free! Colorful LED Lights Stereo Sound: 40mm Drivers Ear-Saving Volume Limiter - 94dB Maxc Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity Hands-Free Calls Online 25H Playtime & Wired Mode Foldable Design

iClever - Aim for Perfection to Meet your Satisfaction As a booming brand, iClever brings the sound at its brightest into every aspect of life. iClever BTH03 Kids Bluetooth Headphones with Breathable Lights Your kids will glow with the music! Protect your kids' hearing while giving them the best musical experience they can find! These iClever volume limiting kids headphones are unique not only because they have built-in protection for overly loud music, but they feature the added a set of LED lights on the earpieces for an extra fun touch. These special headphones even come equipped with a mic so kids can answer calls from grandma or their friends, hands-free! Colorful LED Lights Stereo Sound: 40mm Drivers Ear-Saving Volume Limiter - 94dB Maxc Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity Hands-Free Calls Online 25H Playtime & Wired Mode Foldable Design

Enhancing the joy of listening Give your child the gift of sound on your drive to school or on their walk home with the iClever children's headphones, which feature an impressive sound quality and shortcut buttons on the headphones. Control power, volume, and answer calls, all without reaching for you phone! Comfortable, Foldable, Durable Sometimes you really have to cram things into your bag, but you won't have to worry about damaging these guys! Made with a flexible and foldable headband that adjusts to many sizes of head, the iClever foldable kids headphones will keep your head comfy all day with the synthetic protein ear cushions for enjoyable listening for several hours. Pair and Go When you're headed out the door and are ready to start listening, the iClever ipad headphones for kids will pair almost instantly thanks to the Bluetooth 5.0 technology. No matter the device you're using, from phones, tablets and computers, as long as it has Bluetooth, these headphones can connect no problem!

All Day Listening No matter how long your journey, study session, or other activities, the rechargeable battery on these headphones will keep you jamming for up to 25 hours at a time! If you're almost out of battery, the intelligent quick charge can get you going before you can say "music". You can also plug in the audio cable to use these childrens headphones like you would a normal pair of headphones for uninterrupted listening. Shortcut Buttons for the Ultimate Convenience The full set of buttons include: Volume up / Next Volume down / Previous MFB buttons Charging Port 3.5mm audio Jack Built-in MIC The Ultimate Portable Travel Accessory Ready for adventure? If your child likes to focus during schoolwork or lose themselves in music in the backseat of the car, the iClever child headphones are sure to bring them a new level of focus and joy wherever they take them.

Ear-Saving Volume Limiter To protect your child's sensitive ears, the kids volume-limiting headphones will not play music louder than 94 dB, but still provide a fantastic, all-around stereo sound to immerse you in your music, games, and movies. Lights and Music Who doesn't love bright, colorful lights on your headphones, no less! This fun lights and music combo will put a smile on the face of any kid wearing the iClever kid headphones, which have a power switch to turn the lights on and off as they see fit. Hands-Free Calls Online If your child is getting one-on-one online tutoring, this pair of headphones will enable them to stay fully focused while talking using the built-in mic and phone call capabilities. The kids headphones with microphone intelligently free up your kids' hands to do their work and simultaneously keeps them off their phone while working. Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity Wander freely with Bluetooth 5.0 technology and see where the music will take you! Or feel free to do things around the house while you're on the call - the choice is yours! Wireless & Wired Modes It's always better to have options, which is why you can either talk and listen continuously for 25 hrs on one charge, or if you're staying put, just plug-in using the Aux jack to charge and get an uninterrupted signal simultaneously. Kid-Proof Material We all know kids can be tough on their belongings, which is why we designed the iClever youth headphones to be capable of withstanding all sorts of use. No more broken headphones! Happy Ears, Happy Listening Headphones with less padding can be uncomfortable to wear after a while, but the iClever headphones for kids are meant for the heads of children and are outfitted for ultimate ear bliss. These smaller-sized headphones are even great for teens or adults with smaller head sizes. Listen Anywhere Stay connected to the music on-the-go with these headphones for toddlers, which are of a lightweight construction and fold easily to fit in your purse, backpack or suitcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: Fits my 3yo well. Works well with Bluetooth and also has the direct connect cord option. Cute color and the lights on it are funk clear sound. Adjustable and durable. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work very well for zoom. Very strong!
reviews.reviewText: I had bought the corded version of these four years ago and they are still working. My boys are very tough on headphones so I like the wire adjustment on the sides instead of the plastic. I hope they never get rid of this style, they're very strong and the kids can abuse them without breaking them. I bought this because they've been doing a lot of zoom and need a microphone as well. I like that you can use as a Bluetooth or as a corded headphone set, for when they forget to charge it. Plus they plug into the computer that doesn't have Bluetooth. They have worked on our Motorola phones, iPad, Samsung tablet, and a computer with Bluetooth. Very easy to use with only the three buttons. You can turn the lights on and off by long pressing the volume + and -. The power button pauses and plays. And if you press power twice it goes forward to the next video and if you press it three times it goes back.I wouldn't say that these are totally noise canceling, I would say that the noise canceling is just right. They can concentrate without other noises bothering them, but they can hear me if I need to get their attention.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These wireless headphones are way better then I even expected!!They fit perfectly!! With room to grow!My 4 year old grandson works then easily.They look great. They are made of quality material and seem durable.They charge quickly and come with a cord so they can be used while charging.I'm very happy with them so far... And so is my grandson!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great headphones for kids!
reviews.reviewText: These headphones have lasted for three years now! My son loves that they are comfortable. I love the volume control to protect his ears and that the are Bluetooth enabled. I bought the protection plan but didn't have to use it. Last year they stopped working. We went to target to get a new audio cable and they were good as new! Unfortunately the lights have not worked for a while. My son only uses them plugged in. I'm satisfied with our purchase. They lasted longer than I thought they would. I plan on getting anothet set for this school year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best gift ever
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my grandson (4years old ) he loves them. Fit perfectly and easy to use. Anytime I say it’s chill out time he gets on his chair with his head set and tablet and listen to his videos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great gift
reviews.reviewText: Love these they paired immediately with the kindle fire have a great battery life easy to charge and use…kids love the lights! Seem to be very comfortable for my son to wear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iclever lavender headphones
reviews.reviewText: What a cool gift for an 8 year old very technical savvy. It’s great with the LED dancing to the music. Best gift this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for an extremely affordable pair of toddler headphones, performance be damned, then these are for you. I read the positive reviews and hey, my 3.5-year-old breaks a lot of stuff, so the price made me smile. But after using them only a few times, I could easily see there were better alternatives, even if they cost a few more bucks.The good:-The style appeals to kids. My toddler was happy to scroll through the color options and he thought they looked cool.-They feel sturdy enough. The plastic isn't incredibly flimsy, as I expected, and the photos are a fair representation of the product.-They fold up somewhat to save space.The bad:-The wired connection is awful. My kiddo went this route with his tablet, and it had the problem where you heard extreme crackling any time the aux cable was touched. You spin the cable a little bit or just touch the cable where it is plugged in, and it's all feedback. My kid doesn't sit perfectly still. He moves around, shifts the tablet's position, all kinds of movement during a flight. If your kid is a statue or otherwise mostly immobile while watching something, maybe this is a non-issue for you.-The volume didn't go loud enough. And this is coming from a parent who was worried about all headphones being TOO loud. I tested them with numerous devices before cutting them loose to my son, and no matter what I used, the top volume was not great. That means when we got on a plane, with the default background noise of jet engines, we could barely hear anything, even with the volume all the way up. I found this to be true with two tablets, both wired and Bluetooth, and an iPhone. And yes, I'm aware there is volume control both on the headphones and the devices themselves. Everything involved, all the way up, I was straining to listen.-No noise cancelation whatsoever. To be fair, they aren't advertised that way. But I think everyone expects a little bit of noise to be canceled when using large headphones that cover the ear. These seem to let all the noise in, which pairs terribly with volume that is barely there. The cushion parts for the ears feel very thin. Without any density there, all the noises come right on in.I can't hate on them entirely, right? I mean, they are just over $20. I have a feeling, though, that the cons I've mentioned above are a factor into why these are listed at $40 but always around 40% off. So, if you're someone with a kid who is always breaking or losing their stuff, these are probably a great starter set of headphones. I get it, why spend more money on something that is inevitably only part of the household for a short while? Or maybe you need an affordable gift. Or if money is tight and you need something over nothing, I'm guessing most kids are more than happy to wear these brightly colored, kid-oriented headphones.But for me, I wanted a solid pair for my kid to use during travel for the next few years. Something that would hold up and perform, something he could zone out with and not hear other kids screaming or loud noises, and just enjoy his shows. And these definitely do not fit that description.Better than nothing, but if you have a few dollars to spare, there's got to be a next step up.

I picked up 3 sets of these for my girls that spend an above average amount of time (we feel) on screens. They had been using corded volume limiting headphones and the weakness on those was the cords themselves breaking and constantly needing to be replaced. The cost for that was starting to add up and it made sense to look at Bluetooth ones.Pros- After 2 months of daily use they seem to be working great and have good sound quality- Battery life is good, I charge them once a week and takes about 2 hours or so- They are comfortable to wear- The connectivity is greatCons- The lights are cool but they do cut down the battery life, and when the kid is wearing them they can’t see them anyway so not much use for that. Nice option though and easy to turn on and off.- I feel they are a bit loud for volume limiting headphones but it could just be that they cancel outside noise well because they do seal up well against the ear - either that or the kids are just ignoring me (not impossible).- Not a big fan of the USB port to charge, it’s easy to try pushing it in upside down if you’re not careful which could cause damage, and in reading other reviews it has happened to some folks. I see that was changed up on the newer version that use USB-C that can be reversed, so a lot easier.I would have no problem recommending these, hopefully they last a long time to come

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente regalo para un niño de 10 años
reviews.reviewText: Llegó antes de lo esperado. Los audífonos son muy flexibles, fáciles de utilizar, los conecta mi hijo a su Ipad, a la laptop. las luces led están padrísimas, de varios colores, realmente un producto muy recomendable, mi hijo está encantado y los lleva a todos lados.
Daughter loves the colour of these headphones and they sound great. We don’t often use the light function but they do work and look cute.
